THIS.
Sexual violence happens against transwomen, cismen & transmen too. And no, this isn't complicating the issuâ€¦ https://t.co/e80sr52eLP
@misterbistar I read about it fleetingly. Will add it to my list!
@JuliaGoolia415 I will genuinely riot if #notallmen is made a justification for any sexual violence again. @WomenUndrSiege @qz
@misterbistar I watched the first 2 minutes of the first episode and stopped. :/
Oh and before anybody questions, never ever been yelled at/molested/what not in the day time. Can't say such a thing for home.
@wanderblues it is literally this basic.
What a messy thread.
The whole discourse is wonky but what do you do when you're so struck with fear that logic goes out the window?
Don't touch a women cuz she's someone's daughter wife sister etc works apparently better than don't touch a women full stop.
I dislike having to resort to emotion rather than logic in argument but unfortunately ppl understand that more than reason.
It's a bigger relief for my parents. Imagine seeing your mum's worried face every time you're out. #notallmen see it but #yesallwomen do
And to anyone who's said 'you're running away' I will not apologise for putting my sense of security first. Nobody gets to define it for me
Men are bad everywhere and I still get asked to 'get my tits out' but at least know I know people will be on my side. And the night is safe.
To anyone who's ever said to me 'but u live outside' I love home but outside is convinient. It's not totally safe but I can walk on my own.
Will be home for two weeks & I think it's time to keep a bat in my car as dad suggested. Violence is the only language all understand.
@lovehandle_ THIS. How much can you argue with your parents, esp when you know their concerns are not totally paranoid reactions. Sad.
@lovehandle_ & this is cause we have resources. Women who dont have access must have it tougher as we all know what public transport is like
@lovehandle_ same. I manage to drive after 9pm but nobody else drives in my fam so I'm stuck. So many logistics go into stepping out smh
@lovehandle_ but even the fact that you can be a grown ass woman running your life & still have a curfew. It's frankly amazing.
#TheNightOf is on in-flight entertainment. Sorted.
@lovehandle_ this why I still have a curfew whenever I'm home. I can drive myself around and yet this. It's so abnormal.

Okay let me be savvy. Do you know how to eat rice with your hands?

I always assume that if you're Indian you ðŸ’¯know how to eat rice with your hands. Is this an unreasonable assumption?
